meanings.definition: A person who has been elected to a position or office.
meanings.sent1: The electees celebrated their victory with a party.
meanings.sent2: The electees took their oath of office with pride.
meanings.sent3: The electees joked about having to wear fancy suits every day now.
meanings.sent4: The electees were like shining stars in the eyes of their supporters.
meanings.sent5: The electees were the chosen ones, ready to lead their community.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who have been chosen through an election process.
meanings.sent1: The electees gathered for their first official meeting.
meanings.sent2: The electees represented the diverse voices of the community.
meanings.sent3: The electees playfully argued about who had the fanciest campaign posters.
meanings.sent4: The electees stood united like a strong fortress against challenges.
meanings.sent5: The electees were like puzzle pieces coming together to form a picture of democracy.
